There is actually a mod that makes shuttles infinitely easier: Dtobi's space shuttle engine mod. Though the mod is under new management, it includes a TON of engines, specially designed and coded, to fire through the center of mass. This allows you to build true shuttle replicas, instead of a spaceplane trying to keep the rocket it's attached to vertical.
